record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - April 10, 2008)

[Page: S2952]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Karl Cordova, who is a Bevinetto Fellow working with our staff on the Energy and Natural Resources Committee, be granted the privilege of the floor for the remainder of the debate on S. 2739.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that a member of my staff, Jack Wells, be granted the privileges of the floor during this discussion.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that two law clerks from Senator Cornyn's staff, Alana Hake and Ashley Huff, be granted the privilege of the floor for the remainder of this week--which may not be too long, hopefully.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
